thread.title: Kangana Ranaut turns designer for Vero Moda
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut turns designer for Vero Moda | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Kangana Ranaut turns designer for Vero Moda
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter Bollywood actress Kangana Ranaut has added another feather to her cap by turning into a designer for international brand Vero Moda.
Kangana Ranaut has launched her own collection in Mumbai.
The 28-year-old actress, expressing her excitement about her new venture said, “Apart from being an actor, I have done direction, script writing and other things. However, this is the first time I am exploring the field of designing and I am very excited about it. I hope people will go out and buy my collection.”
Kangana added that she always wanted to explore the field of designing and for her inspiration is always going to be the women of today.
Kangana will next be seen in Vishal Bharadwaj’s ‘Rangoon’ opposite Saif Ali Khan and Shahid Kapoor .
First Published on October 01, 2015 8:20 pm
